body_html:
Sorry I was not clear. Bazel @Head (since 0.2.2) has made C++ auto-configuration the default. I am proposing to adapt the script we use for CUDA configuration. Which is what @davidzchen has started to do IIUC. I also sent a PR for doing the same for python.

Doing that would:

  1. Remove issues with CUDA configuration.
  2. Remove needs for ./configure (which can be kept for user interface), helping people depends on TensorFlow without needing for calling the ./configure script.

Internal reference: b/29006900
